name: Panda Gergasi (Giant Panda)
description: A bamboo-loving bear known for its black and white markings.
details: Native to mountain forests in China.
Spends many hours eating bamboo.
Strong climber and swimmer.

name: Orang Utan
description: An intelligent great ape from Borneo and Sumatra.
details: Its name means person of the forest.
Builds a new tree nest almost every night.
Uses simple tools in the wild.

name: Cimpanzi (Chimpanzee)
description: A social ape that lives in large family groups.
details: Communicates with calls and gestures.
Shares close DNA links with humans.
Very curious and playful.

name: Zirafah (Giraffe)
description: The tallest land animal, adapted for browsing treetops.
details: Long neck with seven vertebrae.
Each giraffe has a unique spot pattern.
Can run surprisingly fast.

name: Zebra
description: A striped grazer that often moves in herds.
details: Every stripe pattern is different.
Stripes can confuse predators.
Very alert and social.

name: Gajah Asia (Asian Elephant)
description: A highly intelligent herbivore with a versatile trunk.
details: Uses trunk for feeding, smelling, and touch.
Lives in close family groups.
Plays an important role in forest ecosystems.

name: Harimau Malaya (Malayan Tiger)
description: Malaysia's iconic big cat and a critically endangered species.
details: Excellent swimmer.
Uses stealth and camouflage to hunt.
Needs strong conservation support.

name: Kuda Nil (Hippopotamus)
description: A massive semi-aquatic mammal that spends much of the day in water.
details: Can hold breath underwater for several minutes.
Comes out to graze mostly at night.
Looks calm but is very powerful.

name: Penguin
description: A flightless seabird built for swimming.
details: Uses flippers to move quickly underwater.
Dense feathers help keep heat in.
Lives in colonies with strong social behavior.

name: Beruang Madu (Sun Bear)
description: The smallest bear species, native to Southeast Asia.
details: Known for a pale chest mark.
Has a very long tongue for honey and insects.
Excellent tree climber.
